subject: Interested in your Art
body:
Hi there,

I recently came across your artwork and was really impressed by your style. I’m an independent art collector currently looking to acquire a few new pieces for a personal project, and your work stood out to me.

If you’re open to discussing available works or commissions, I’d love to hear more about your process, pricing, or portfolio.

Thanks for your time, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Jonathan Peterson Miller

subject: Beautiful work — are any pieces available?
body:
Hi there,
I came across your artwork recently and it truly caught my eye. I’d love to know if you currently have any pieces for sale.

Best regards,
Jonathan Peterson Miller

subject: Quick question about your artwork
body:
Hello,
Your work really drew me in. Are you open to sharing what you have available right now?

Best regards,
Jonathan Peterson Miller

subject: Saw your work and had to reach out

Hi,
I saw one of your pieces online and felt compelled to message you. Would you be open to showing me more of your portfolio?

Best regards,
Jonathan Peterson Miller
